observation: Colorado Prime Foods – Gourmet Dining at Home Since 1959  Skip to content Colorado Prime Foods Menu Welcome to Colorado Prime! Chances are, if you are coming to us by referral it’s because you have already tried, and loved, some of our food at one of our customer’s homes. The finest foods, the top 12% of all beef, gourmet trimming, flash frozen Cryovac packaging, individual portion packaging, specialized diets, optional financing are just some of the ways we can help you to enjoy gourmet foods that are normally reserved for the finest restaurants. Our knowledgeable and friendly Food Specialists are available to explain all of our services and benefits and customize a food plan that works best for you.
